p: Virus inoculum was prepared in serum-free MEM and added to cell monolayers which were prewashed twice with PBS. For infection of MDCK cells, 1 µg/mL tosylsulfonyl phenylalanyl chloromethyl ketone (TPCK)-trypsin (Sigma-Aldrich) was added to virus inoculum. After 1 h of incubation at 35 °C, virus inoculum was removed and cells were washed once with PBS. Then, fresh serum-free MEM was added and cells were incubated back at 35 °C [ 7].
